Standard.Name: Unlock Text (trigger with lowest GUID will be used for unlock condition display)

Item.Command: local PID = ts.Participants.GetGetCurrentParticipantID(); local onlyallowedowner_selected = true; for i,userdata in ipairs(session.selection) do; if g_LTL_Serp.IsUserdataValid(userdata) then; local OID = g_LTL_Serp.get_OID(userdata); if OID~=nil then; local Owner = g_LTL_Serp.GetGameObjectPath(OID,"Owner"); if not g_DiploActions_Serp.CommandAllyAllowed(PID,Owner,nil,nil,"CommandAll") then; onlyallowedowner_selected = false; end; end; end; end; if onlyallowedowner_selected then game.startMouseMode(2001000);end;

local PID = ts.Participants.GetGetCurrentParticipantID(); local onlyallowedowner_selected = true; for i,userdata in ipairs(session.selection) do; if g_LTL_Serp.IsUserdataValid(userdata) then; local OID = g_LTL_Serp.get_OID(userdata); if OID~=nil then; local Owner = g_LTL_Serp.GetGameObjectPath(OID,"Owner"); if not g_DiploActions_Serp.CommandAllyAllowed(PID,Owner,nil,nil,"CommandAll") then; onlyallowedowner_selected = false; end; end; end; end; if onlyallowedowner_selected then game.startMouseMode(2001296);end;
